sourcesContent:
import styled from 'styled-components'
import HomeButton from './HomeButton'
import MenuItem from './MenuItem'
import Blurb from './Blurb'

let Container = styled.div`
  height: 100vh;
  width: 30vw;
  padding: 10vmin;
  position: fixed;
  box-sizing: border-box;
`

let MenuContainer = styled.div`
  margin: 1rem 0;
`

class Sidebar extends React.Component {
  render() {
    return <Container>
      <HomeButton/>
      <MenuContainer>
        <MenuItem href="/about">
          about
        </MenuItem>
        <MenuItem href="/rules">
          site rules
        </MenuItem>
        <MenuItem href="/terms">
          terms of service
        </MenuItem>
        <MenuItem href="/privacy">
          privacy
        </MenuItem>
      </MenuContainer>
      <Blurb/>
    </Container>
  }
}

export default Sidebar
